00020 void ControlServer::InitInstance()
00021 {
00022         localConnectorId = 0;
00023 
00024         port = 0;
00025 
00026         serviceId = ComTools::GeneratePeerId();
00027         TcpServer::SetServiceId( serviceId );
00028 
00029         // Change properties of my inherited faces
00030         TcpServer::SetServiceId(GetServiceId());
00031         TcpServer::SetTcpNoDelay(true);
00032         TcpServer::AddCallbackObject( this ); // Will use my XMLTreeParser side
00033 
00034         // In order to check parse data
00035         // Initialise XsdValidators for :
00036         // - control query validation
00037         ControlQueryValidator.CreateSchemaFromString( ControlQueryXsdSchema );
00038 #ifdef DEBUG
00039         // - control answer validation in debug mode
00040         ControlAnswerValidator.CreateSchemaFromString( ControlAnswerXsdSchema );
00041 #endif
00042 
00043         // Give a pointer to myself on my VariableAttributListener side
00044         VariableAttributListener::SetUserData( this );
00045 
00046         SetStatus( STATUS_INIT );
00047 
00048         VariableAttribut* va = NULL;
00049 
00050         va = AddVariable(LockString);
00051         va->SetType("integer");
00052         va->SetAccess(ReadWriteAccess);
00053         va->SetDescription("Use for locking access");
00054         lockIntVariable = new IntVariableAttribut(va, 0);
00055 
00056         va = AddVariable(NameString);
00057         va->SetType("string");
00058         va->SetAccess(ConstantAccess);
00059         va->SetDescription("Registered name of this service");
00060         NameVariable = new StringVariableAttribut( va, serviceName );
00061 
00062         va = AddVariable(OwnerString);
00063         va->SetType("string");
00064         va->SetAccess(ConstantAccess);
00065         va->SetDescription("Login which launches this service");
00066         OwnerVariable = new StringVariableAttribut( va, "none" );
00067 
00068         va = AddVariable(ClassString);
00069         va->SetType("class");
00070         va->SetAccess(ConstantAccess);
00071         va->SetDescription("Class of this service");
00072         ClassVariable = new StringVariableAttribut( va, DefaultServiceClassName );
00073 
00074         va = AddVariable(PeerIdString);
00075         va->SetType("hexadecimal");
00076         va->SetAccess(ConstantAccess);
00077         va->SetDescription("PeerId of this service");
00078         PeerIdVariable = new StringVariableAttribut( va, serviceId );
00079 
00080         registerDnsSd = NULL;
00081 }
00082 
00083 ControlServer::ControlServer(const SimpleString service_name)
00084 :       serviceName( service_name )
00085 {
00086         InitInstance();
00087 }

00089 ControlServer::~ControlServer()
00090 {
00091         // Stop myself
00092         TcpServer::RemoveAllCallbackObjects();
00093         TcpServer::Close();
00094         XMLTreeParser::StopThread(0);
00095 
00096         listValueListener.Lock();
00097         for(listValueListener.First(); listValueListener.NotAtEnd(); 
00098                 listValueListener.Next())
00099         {
00100                 delete listValueListener.GetCurrent();
00101                 listValueListener.RemoveCurrent();
00102         }
00103         listValueListener.Unlock();
00104 
00105         for(listVariable.First(); listVariable.NotAtEnd(); listVariable.Next())
00106         {
00107                 delete listVariable.GetCurrent();
00108                 listVariable.RemoveCurrent();
00109         }
00110 
00111         // Remove all inoutput !
00112         for( listInOutput.First(); listInOutput.NotAtEnd(); listInOutput.Next())
00113         {
00114                 delete listInOutput.GetCurrent();
00115                 listInOutput.RemoveCurrent();
00116         }
00117 
00118         // Destroy data
00119         if( lockIntVariable != NULL )
00120         {
00121                 delete lockIntVariable;
00122                 lockIntVariable = NULL;
00123         }
00124 
00125         if( NameVariable != NULL )
00126         {
00127                 delete NameVariable;
00128                 NameVariable = NULL;
00129         }
00130 
00131         if( OwnerVariable != NULL )
00132         {
00133                 delete OwnerVariable;
00134                 OwnerVariable = NULL;
00135         }
00136 
00137         if( ClassVariable != NULL )
00138         {
00139                 delete ClassVariable;
00140                 ClassVariable = NULL;
00141         }
00142 
00143         if ( PeerIdVariable != NULL )
00144         {
00145                 delete PeerIdVariable;
00146                 PeerIdVariable = NULL;
00147         }
00148 
00149         if( registerDnsSd )
00150         {
00151                 delete registerDnsSd;
00152                 registerDnsSd = NULL;
00153         }
00154 }
00155 
00156 bool ControlServer::StartServer()
00157 {
00158         if ( GetStatus() != STATUS_INIT )
00159         {
00160                 // server already launch
00161                 return false;
00162         }
00163 
00164         try
00165         {
00166 
00167                 Create(0);
00168 
00169                 port = GetSocket()->GetPortNb();
00170                 // GetSocket()->GetHostName((char*)hostname, HOST_NAME_MAX_SIZE);
00171 
00172                 for(unsigned int NbMaxRegisterTries = 10; NbMaxRegisterTries > 0; NbMaxRegisterTries--)
00173                 {
00174                         // Add peerID value
00175                         TemporaryMemoryBuffer tmp_peerid(30);   // To prevent buffer overflow
00176                         snprintf( tmp_peerid, 30, "%08x", GetServiceId());        
00177                         PeerIdVariable->SetValue( (char*)tmp_peerid );
00178 
00179                         // Create an object to register the service
00180                         registerDnsSd = new RegisterOmiscidService( PeerIdVariable->GetValue(), "local.", (unsigned short)port, false);
00181 
00182                         // Add Constant variable
00183                         // The desctiption if full by default
00184                         registerDnsSd->Properties["desc"] = "full"; // Will be set to part if not full
00185 
00186                         // Add owner value
00187                         OwnerVariable->SetValue( GetLoggedUser() );
00188 
00189                         NameVariable->SetValue( serviceName );
00190 
00191                         // To prevent adding variable , inputs from another thread...
00192                         SetStatus(STATUS_RUNNING);
00193 
00194                         SimpleString tmp;
00195                         bool TxtRecordIsFull = false;
00196 
00197                         // Add Constant variable
00198                         for( listVariable.First(); TxtRecordIsFull != true && listVariable.NotAtEnd(); listVariable.Next() )
00199                         {
00200                                 if ( listVariable.GetCurrent()->GetAccess() == ConstantAccess )
00201                                 {
00202                                         // Compute len of the key
00203                                         unsigned int TotalLenOfRecord;
00204                                         TotalLenOfRecord  = listVariable.GetCurrent()->GetName().GetLength();   // Len of name
00205                                         TotalLenOfRecord += 1;  // '='
00206                                         TotalLenOfRecord += listVariable.GetCurrent()->GetValue().GetLength();  // len of value
00207 
00208                                         if ( TotalLenOfRecord > 252 )
00209                                         {
00210                                                 // We could not set the full data in the variable
00211                                                 // We just say it is a variable
00212                                                 tmp = "c";
00213                                         }
00214                                         else
00215                                         {
00216                                                 tmp = "c/";
00217                                                 tmp += listVariable.GetCurrent()->GetValue();
00218                                         }
00219                                         registerDnsSd->Properties[listVariable.GetCurrent()->GetName()] = tmp;
00220                                         TxtRecordIsFull = registerDnsSd->Properties.TxtRecordIsFull();
00221                                         if ( TxtRecordIsFull )
00222                                         {
00223                                                 // undefine the last add
00224                                                 registerDnsSd->Properties.Undefine( listVariable.GetCurrent()->GetName() );
00225                                                 // Say the definition is partial
00226                                                 registerDnsSd->Properties["desc"] = "part";
00227                                         }
00228                                 }
00229                         }
00230 
00231                         // remove Name variable from TxtRecord list, when using DNS-SD, we've got the "id" as service name
00232                         registerDnsSd->Properties.Undefine( PeerIdString );
00233 
00234                         // Add inputs/outputs/inoutputs
00235                         if ( TxtRecordIsFull != true )
00236                         {
00237                                 // Add Constant variable
00238                                 for( listInOutput.First(); TxtRecordIsFull != true && listInOutput.NotAtEnd(); listInOutput.Next() )
00239                                 {
00240                                         ConnectorKind KindOfInOutput = listInOutput.GetCurrent()->GetType();
00241                                         switch( KindOfInOutput )
00242                                         {
00243                                                 case AnInput:
00244                                                         tmp = "i/";
00245                                                         break;
00246 
00247                                                 case AnOutput:
00248                                                         tmp = "o/";
00249                                                         break;
00250 
00251                                                 case AnInOutput:
00252                                                         tmp = "d/";
00253                                                         break;
00254 
00255                                                         // to make gcc happy
00256                                                         // If by error, we do not have the type, we do not publish it...
00257                                                 case UnkownConnectorKind:
00258                                                         continue;
00259                                         }
00260 
00261                                         tmp += listInOutput.GetCurrent()->GetTcpPort();
00262                                         registerDnsSd->Properties[listInOutput.GetCurrent()->GetName()] = tmp;
00263                                         TxtRecordIsFull = registerDnsSd->Properties.TxtRecordIsFull();
00264                                         if ( TxtRecordIsFull )
00265                                         {
00266                                                 // undefine the last add
00267                                                 registerDnsSd->Properties.Undefine( listInOutput.GetCurrent()->GetName() );
00268                                                 // Say the definition is partial
00269                                                 registerDnsSd->Properties["desc"] = "part";
00270                                         }
00271                                 }               
00272                         }
00273 
00274                         // Add non constant variable
00275                         if ( TxtRecordIsFull != true )
00276                         {
00277                                 // Add Constant variable
00278                                 for( listVariable.First(); TxtRecordIsFull != true && listVariable.NotAtEnd(); listVariable.Next() )
00279                                 {
00280                                         VariableAccessType VarAccess = listVariable.GetCurrent()->GetAccess();
00281                                         switch( VarAccess )
00282                                         {
00283                                                 case ReadAccess:
00284                                                         tmp = "r";
00285                                                         break;
00286 
00287                                                 case ReadWriteAccess:
00288                                                         tmp = "w";
00289                                                         break;
00290 
00291                                                 case ConstantAccess:
00292                                                         // already done
00293                                                         continue;
00294                                         }
00295 
00296                                         registerDnsSd->Properties[listVariable.GetCurrent()->GetName()] = tmp;
00297                                         TxtRecordIsFull = registerDnsSd->Properties.TxtRecordIsFull();
00298                                         if ( TxtRecordIsFull )
00299                                         {
00300                                                 // undefine the last add
00301                                                 registerDnsSd->Properties.Undefine( listVariable.GetCurrent()->GetName() );
00302                                                 // Say the definition is partial
00303                                                 registerDnsSd->Properties["desc"] = "part";
00304                                         }
00305                                 }               
00306                         }
00307 
00308                         // Actually register
00309                         registerDnsSd->Register(false);
00310 
00311                         // Check if everything goes fine
00312                         if( registerDnsSd->IsRegistered() )
00313                         {
00314                                 OmiscidTrace( "registered '%s' as '%s' ok\n", serviceName.GetStr(), registerDnsSd->RegisteredName.GetStr() );
00315                                 // serviceName = registerDnsSd->RegisteredName;
00316                                 // NameVariable->SetValue( serviceName );
00317                                 StartThreadProcessMsg();
00318                                 return true;
00319                         }
00320 
00321                         // Ok, destroy the register Object
00322                         delete registerDnsSd;
00323                         registerDnsSd = NULL;
00324 
00325                         OmiscidError( "Changing PeerId from %8.8x ", serviceId );
00326 
00327                         // Generate a new PeerId and set it !
00328                         serviceId = ComTools::GeneratePeerId();
00329                         TcpServer::SetServiceId( serviceId );
00330 
00331                         OmiscidError( "to %8.8x because of name conflict.\n", serviceId );
00332                 }
00333 
00334                 // Something was wrong...
00335                 OmiscidError( "Registration of '%s' failed\n", serviceName.GetStr() );
00336         }
00337         catch(SocketException e)
00338         {
00339                 e.Display();
00340         }
00341 
00342         if ( registerDnsSd )
00343         {
00344                 // Delete DNS-SD object
00345                 delete registerDnsSd;
00346                 registerDnsSd = NULL;
00347         }
00348 
00349         // An error occurred, back to init mode
00350         SetStatus( STATUS_INIT );
00351         return false;
00352 }
00353 
00354 void ControlServer::StartThreadProcessMsg()
00355 {
00356         XMLTreeParser::StartThread();
00357 }

00359 void ControlServer::GenerateGlobalShortDescription(SimpleString& str)
00360 {
00361         for(listInOutput.First(); listInOutput.NotAtEnd(); listInOutput.Next())
00362         {
00363                 (listInOutput.GetCurrent())->GenerateShortDescription(str);
00364         }
00365 
00366         for(listVariable.First(); listVariable.NotAtEnd(); listVariable.Next())
00367         {
00368                 (listVariable.GetCurrent())->GenerateShortDescription(str);
00369         }
00370 }
00371 
00372 InOutputAttribut* ControlServer::FindInOutput(const SimpleString InOutputName)
00373 {
00374         for(listInOutput.First(); listInOutput.NotAtEnd(); listInOutput.Next())
00375         {
00376                 if ( strcasecmp(InOutputName.GetStr(), listInOutput.GetCurrent()->GetName().GetStr() ) == 0 )
00377                         return listInOutput.GetCurrent();
00378         }
00379         return NULL;
00380 }
00381 
00382 VariableAttribut* ControlServer::FindVariable(const SimpleString VarName)
00383 { 
00384         for(listVariable.First(); listVariable.NotAtEnd(); listVariable.Next())
00385         {
00386                 if( strcasecmp( VarName.GetStr(), listVariable.GetCurrent()->GetName().GetStr() ) == 0 )
00387                         return listVariable.GetCurrent();
00388         }
00389         return NULL;
00390 }
00391 
00392 void ControlServer::ProcessAMessage(XMLMessage* msg)
00393 {
00394         // OmiscidTrace( "in ControlServer::ProcessAMessage\n");
00395         // OmiscidTrace( "from pid = %u \n",msg->pid);
00396 
00397         if ( msg == NULL )
00398         {
00399                 // Nothing to do
00400                 return;
00401         }
00402 
00403         xmlNodePtr node = msg->GetRootNode();
00404 
00405         // if( strcmp((const char*)node->name, "controlQuery") == 0 )
00406         if ( ControlQueryValidator.ValidateDoc(msg->doc) )
00407         {
00408                 SimpleString id;
00409                 xmlAttrPtr attr = XMLMessage::FindAttribute("id", node);
00410                 if(attr)
00411                 { id = SimpleString((const char*)attr->children->content);}
00412 
00413                 bool ReplyAnAnswer = true;      // default
00414                 SimpleString str;
00415 
00416                 if(node->children == NULL)
00417                 {
00418                         //global description      
00419                         GenerateGlobalShortDescription(str);
00420                 }
00421                 else
00422                 {        
00423                         //requete plus precise
00424                         xmlNodePtr cur_node = node->children;     
00425                         for(; cur_node; cur_node = cur_node->next)
00426                         {
00427                                 SimpleString name = (const char*)(cur_node->name);
00428                                 //std::cerr << "tag name="<<(*it)->name <<"\n";
00429                                 if( name == InOutputAttribut::input_str.GetStr() ||
00430                                         name == InOutputAttribut::output_str.GetStr() || 
00431                                         name == InOutputAttribut::inoutput_str.GetStr() )
00432                                 {
00433                                         // OmiscidTrace( " process io : %s \n", (*it)->name.GetStr());
00434                                         ProcessInOutputQuery(cur_node, str);
00435                                 }
00436                                 else if( name == VariableAttribut::variable_str.GetStr() )
00437                                 {
00438                                         ProcessVariableQuery(cur_node, msg->pid,  str);          
00439                                 }
00440                                 else if( name == "connect" )
00441                                 {
00442                                         ProcessConnectQuery(cur_node, str);
00443                                 }
00444                                 else if( name == "subscribe" )
00445                                 {
00446                                         ProcessSubscribeQuery(cur_node, msg->pid, true, str);
00447                                 }
00448                                 else if( name == "unsubscribe" )
00449                                 {
00450                                         ReplyAnAnswer = false;
00451                                         ProcessSubscribeQuery(cur_node, msg->pid, false, str);
00452                                 }
00453                                 else if( name == "lock" )
00454                                 {
00455                                         ProcessLockQuery(cur_node, msg->pid, true, str);
00456                                 }
00457                                 else if( name == "unlock" )
00458                                 {
00459                                         ProcessLockQuery(cur_node, msg->pid, false, str);
00460                                 }
00461                                 else if( name == "fullDescription" )
00462                                 {
00463                                         ProcessFullDescriptionQuery(cur_node, str);
00464                                 }
00465                                 else
00466                                 {
00467                                         // Should not appear
00468                                         OmiscidError( "unknown tag : %s\n", name.GetStr() );
00469                                 }
00470                         }        
00471                         // OmiscidError( "Send : %s \n", str.GetStr());
00472                 }
00473 
00474                 if ( ReplyAnAnswer == true )
00475                 {
00476                         str = "<controlAnswer id=\""+id+"\">" 
00477                                 + str     
00478                                 + "</controlAnswer>";
00479 
00480         #ifdef DEBUG
00481                         if ( ControlAnswerValidator.ValidateDoc( str ) == false )
00482                         {
00483                                 OmiscidError( "ControlServer::ProcessAMessage: bad ControlAnswer sent.\n" );
00484                         }
00485         #endif
00486 
00487                         TcpServer::listConnections.Lock();
00488                         MsgSocket* ms = FindClientFromId( msg->pid );
00489                         if( ms )
00490                         {
00491                                 try
00492                                 {
00493                                         ms->Send((int)str.GetLength(), str.GetStr());
00494                                 }
00495                                 catch( SocketException& e )
00496                                 {
00497                                         OmiscidError( "Error when responding to a client request : %s (%d)\n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err );
00498                                 }
00499                         }
00500                 }
00501                 TcpServer::listConnections.Unlock();
00502         }
00503         else
00504         {
00505                 OmiscidError( "waited : controlQuery, received='%s'\n", node->name);
00506         }
00507 }
00508 
00509 void ControlServer::ProcessInOutputQuery(xmlNodePtr node, SimpleString& str_answer)
00510 {
00511         if(node->children != NULL)
00512         {
00513                 OmiscidError( "unknown inoutput query (unwaited child)\n");
00514         }
00515         else
00516         {
00517                 xmlAttrPtr attr = XMLMessage::FindAttribute("name", node);    
00518                 bool found = (attr != NULL);      
00519                 if(found)
00520                 {
00521                         SimpleString name((const char*)attr->children->content);
00522                         InOutputAttribut* ioa = FindInOutput(name);
00523                         if(ioa)
00524                         {
00525                                 ioa->GenerateLongDescription(str_answer);
00526                         }
00527                 }
00528                 else
00529                 {
00530                         OmiscidTrace( "understood query (name requested)\n");      
00531                 }
00532         }
00533 }
00534 
00535 void ControlServer::ProcessVariableQuery(xmlNodePtr node, unsigned int pid, SimpleString& str_answer)
00536 {
00537         //std::cerr<<"in processVariable\n";
00538         xmlAttrPtr attr = XMLMessage::FindAttribute("name", node);    
00539         bool found = (attr != NULL);
00540 
00541         if ( found )
00542         {
00543                 SimpleString name((const char*)attr->children->content);
00544                 VariableAttribut* va = FindVariable(name);    
00545 
00546                 // OmiscidTrace( "Query on name '%s' in %8.8x\n", name.GetStr(), GetServiceId() ); 
00547 
00548                 if(va)
00549                 {
00550                         if(node->children == NULL)
00551                         {
00552                                 // OmiscidTrace( "GenerateLongDescription\n" );
00553                                 va->GenerateLongDescription(str_answer);
00554                         }
00555                         else
00556                         {
00557                                 // OmiscidTrace( "VariableChange\n" );
00558                                 xmlNodePtr val_node = XMLMessage::FindFirstChild("value", node);
00559                                 if(val_node)
00560                                 {
00561                                         if(LockOk(pid) && va->CanBeModifiedFromOutside(GetStatus()))
00562                                         {
00563                                                 if(va->GetType() == "xml")
00564                                                 { 
00565                                                         // SimpleString val_modif((const char*)val_node->children->content);
00566                                                         // VariableAttribut::ModifXmlInStrRevert(val_modif);
00567                                                         VariableChange( va, (const char*)val_node->children->content, GetStatus() );
00568                                                 }
00569                                                 else
00570                                                 {
00571                                                         VariableChange( va, (const char*)val_node->children->content, GetStatus() );
00572                                                 }
00573                                         }
00574                                         va->GenerateLongDescription(str_answer);
00575                                 }
00576                         }
00577                 }
00578         }
00579         else
00580         {
00581                 OmiscidTrace( "understood query (name requested)\n");      
00582         }
00583 }
00584 
00585 void ControlServer::ProcessConnectQuery(xmlNodePtr node, SimpleString& str_answer)
00586 {
00587         //std::cerr << "connect query : not yet implemented\n";
00588         xmlAttrPtr attr = XMLMessage::FindAttribute("name", node);    
00589         bool found = (attr != NULL);  
00590         if( found ) 
00591         {
00592                 SimpleString name((const char*)attr->children->content);
00593                 InOutputAttribut* ioa = FindInOutput(name);     
00594                 if(ioa)
00595                 {
00596                         bool found_host = false;
00597                         bool found_port = false;
00598                         bool tcp = true;
00599                         int port = 0;
00600                         SimpleString host;
00601 
00602                         xmlNodePtr cur_node = node->children;
00603                         for(; cur_node; cur_node = cur_node->next)
00604                         {
00605                                 const char* nodename = (const char*)(cur_node->name);
00606                                 if(strcmp(nodename, "host") == 0)
00607                                 {
00608                                         host = SimpleString((const char*)cur_node->children->content);
00609                                         found_host = true;
00610                                 }       
00611                                 else if((strcmp(nodename,"tcp") == 0) || (strcmp(nodename,"udp")==0) )
00612                                 {
00613                                         tcp = (strcmp(nodename, "tcp") == 0);
00614                                         found_port = true;
00615                                         port = atoi((const char*)(cur_node->children->content));
00616                                 }
00617                                 else 
00618                                 {
00619                                         OmiscidError( "in connect query : unused tag :\n");
00620 #if defined DEBUG
00621                                         XMLMessage::DisplayNode(cur_node, stderr);
00622 #endif
00623                                 }
00624                         }
00625                         if(found_port && found_host)
00626                         {
00627                                 Connect(host, port, tcp, ioa);
00628                                 ioa->GenerateConnectAnswer(str_answer);
00629                         }
00630                 }
00631         }
00632         else
00633         {
00634                 OmiscidTrace( "understood query (name requested)\n");      
00635         }
00636 }
00637 void ControlServer::ProcessSubscribeQuery(xmlNodePtr node, unsigned peer_id, bool subscribe, SimpleString& str_answer)
00638 {
00639         //std::cerr << "connect query : not yet implemented\n";
00640         xmlAttrPtr attr = XMLMessage::FindAttribute("name", node);    
00641         bool found = (attr != NULL);  
00642         if(!found)
00643         {
00644                 OmiscidTrace( "understood query (name requested)\n");      
00645         }
00646         else
00647         {
00648                 SimpleString name((const char*)attr->children->content);
00649                 VariableAttribut* va = FindVariable(name);     
00650                 if( va )
00651                 {
00652                         if (subscribe)
00653                         {
00654                                 AddListener(va, peer_id);
00655                                 va->GenerateLongDescription( str_answer );
00656                         }
00657                         else
00658                         {
00659                                 RemoveListener(va, peer_id);
00660                         }
00661                 }
00662         }
00663 }
00664 
00665 void ControlServer::ProcessLockQuery(xmlNodePtr node, unsigned int pid, bool lock, SimpleString& str_answer)
00666 {
00667         SimpleString result = "<";
00668         if(lock)
00669         {
00670                 result += "lock result=\"";
00671                 if(LockOk(pid)){
00672                         lockIntVariable->SetValue((int)pid);
00673                         result+="ok";
00674                 }else{
00675                         result += "failed";
00676                 }
00677         }
00678         else
00679         {      
00680                 result += "unlock result=\"";
00681                 if(LockOk(pid)){
00682                         result+="ok";
00683                         lockIntVariable->SetValue(0);
00684                 }else{
00685                         result += "failed";
00686                 }           
00687         }
00688 
00689         TemporaryMemoryBuffer tmp_peerid(10);
00690         snprintf(tmp_peerid, 10, "%08x",  (unsigned int)lockIntVariable->GetValue());  
00691         result += "\" peer=\"";
00692         result += tmp_peerid;
00693         result += "\"/>";
00694 
00695         str_answer += result;
00696 }
00697 
00698 void ControlServer::ProcessFullDescriptionQuery(xmlNodePtr node, SimpleString& str_answer)
00699 {
00700         // Add InOutput description
00701         for( listInOutput.First(); listInOutput.NotAtEnd(); listInOutput.Next() )
00702         {
00703                 listInOutput.GetCurrent()->GenerateLongDescription(str_answer);
00704         }
00705 
00706         // Add variable description
00707         for( listVariable.First(); listVariable.NotAtEnd(); listVariable.Next() )
00708         {
00709                 listVariable.GetCurrent()->GenerateLongDescription(str_answer);
00710         }
00711 }
00712 
00713 bool ControlServer::LockOk(unsigned int peer){
00714         RefreshLock();
00715         return (lockIntVariable->GetValue() == 0) || (((unsigned int)lockIntVariable->GetValue()) == peer);
00716 }
00717 
00718 void ControlServer::RefreshLock(){
00719         unsigned int peer = (unsigned int)lockIntVariable->GetValue();
00720         if(peer != 0){
00721                 if(!IsStillConnected(peer)){
00722                         lockIntVariable->SetValue(0);
00723                 }
00724         }    
00725 }
00726 
00727 void ControlServer::Connect(const SimpleString host, int port, bool tcp, InOutputAttribut* ioa)
00728 {
00729 #ifdef DEBUG
00730         fprintf(stderr, "in ControlServer::Connect (%s:%d", host.GetStr(), port);
00731         if(tcp) fprintf(stderr, " [TCP] "); else fprintf(stderr, " [UDP] ");
00732         fprintf(stderr, "%s\n", ioa->GetName().GetStr());
00733 #endif
00734 }
00735 
00736 void ControlServer::VariableChange( VariableAttribut* va, SimpleString NewValue, ControlServerStatus status )
00737 {
00738         OmiscidTrace( "ControlServer::VariableChange '%s' New Value='%s'\n", va->GetName().GetStr(), NewValue.GetStr());
00739         // Do what we must do...
00740 
00741         // va will call back me to know if I agree to change it's value
00742         // va will also notify me that the value has changed (if change have been validated)
00743         va->SetValue( NewValue );
00744 }

00746 bool ControlServer::IsValid( VariableAttribut * ChangedVariable, SimpleString newValue )
00747 {
00748         // OIutside check is done when receiving external modification is asked
00749         return ChangedVariable->CanBeModifiedFromInside(GetStatus());
00750 }
00751 
00752 void ControlServer::VariableChanged( VariableAttribut * ChangedVariable )
00753 {
00754         if ( Status == STATUS_RUNNING )
00755         {
00756                 NotifyValueChanged( ChangedVariable );
00757         }
00758 }
00759 
00760 VariableAttribut* ControlServer::AddVariable(const SimpleString VarName)
00761 {
00762         if ( GetStatus() == STATUS_RUNNING || VarName.IsEmpty() )
00763         {
00764                 return NULL;
00765         }
00766 
00767         // Look for a Varible of an Input with the same name
00768         if ( FindVariable( VarName ) != NULL )
00769         {
00770                 // Already exists
00771                 OmiscidError( "A variable with the same name already exists.\n" );
00772                 return NULL;
00773         }
00774 
00775         // Look for a Varible of an Input with the same name
00776         if ( FindInOutput( VarName ) != NULL )
00777         {
00778                 // Already exists
00779                 OmiscidError( "A connector with the same name already exists. Could not add variable.\n" );
00780                 return NULL;
00781         }
00782 
00783         VariableAttribut* va = new VariableAttribut(VarName);
00784         listVariable.Add(va);
00785 
00786         // I am the first listener
00787         va->AddListener( this );
00788 
00789         return va;
00790 }
00791 
00792 InOutputAttribut* ControlServer::AddInOutput(const SimpleString InOutputName, ComTools* com_tool, ConnectorKind kind_of_input)
00793 {
00794         if ( GetStatus() == STATUS_RUNNING || InOutputName.IsEmpty() )
00795         {
00796                 return NULL;
00797         }
00798 
00799         // Look for a Varible of an Input with the same name
00800         if ( FindInOutput( InOutputName ) != NULL )
00801         {
00802                 // Already exists
00803                 OmiscidError( "A connector with the same name already exists.\n" );
00804                 return NULL;
00805         }
00806 
00807         // Look for a Varible of an Input with the same name
00808         if ( FindVariable( InOutputName ) != NULL )
00809         {
00810                 // Already exists
00811                 OmiscidError( "A variable with the same name already exists. Could not add connector.\n" );
00812                 return NULL;
00813         }
00814 
00815         // Add the connector
00816         unsigned int ConnectorId;
00817 
00818         InOutputAttribut* ioa = new InOutputAttribut(InOutputName, com_tool, kind_of_input);
00819         if ( com_tool )
00820         {
00821                 // Incr number for the Connector
00822                 localConnectorId++;
00823                 if ( (localConnectorId & ComTools::SERVICE_PEERID) != 0 )
00824                 {
00825                         fprintf( stderr, "Too many connector (>127). Unexpected features may appear\n." );
00826                 }
00827 
00828                 ConnectorId = localConnectorId & ComTools::CONNECTOR_ID;
00829 
00830                 com_tool->SetServiceId( GetServiceId() | ConnectorId );
00831         }
00832 
00833         listInOutput.Add(ioa);
00834 
00835         return ioa;
00836 }
00837 
00839 
00840 void ControlServer::NotifyValueChanged(VariableAttribut* var)
00841 {       
00842         listValueListener.Lock();
00843         ValueListener* vl = FindValueListener(var);
00844         if(vl && vl->HasListener())
00845         {
00846                 SimpleString str("<variable name=\"");
00847                 str = str + var->GetName()+"\"><value>"+ var->GetValue()+"</value></variable>";
00848                 str = "<controlEvent>" + str + "</controlEvent>";
00849 
00850 #ifdef DEBUG
00851                 // Validate against XSD schema
00852                 if ( ControlAnswerValidator.ValidateDoc( str ) == false )
00853                 {
00854                         // bad message...
00855                         OmiscidError( "ControlServer::NotifyValueChanged: bad controlEvent sent.\n" );
00856                         return;
00857                 }
00858 #endif
00859 
00860                 for(vl->listListener.First(); vl->listListener.NotAtEnd(); vl->listListener.Next())
00861                 {
00862                         listConnections.Lock();
00863                         MsgSocket* sock = FindClientFromId(vl->listListener.GetCurrent());
00864                         if( sock )
00865                         {
00866                                 try
00867                                 {
00868                                         sock->Send(str.GetLength(), str.GetStr());
00869                                 }
00870                                 catch( SocketException& e )
00871                                 {
00872                                         OmiscidTrace( "Error notification of value changes : %s (%d)\n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err );
00873                                 }
00874                         }
00875                         else
00876                         {
00877                                 vl->listListener.RemoveCurrent();
00878                         }
00879                         listConnections.Unlock();
00880                 }
00881         }
00882         listValueListener.Unlock();
00883 }
00884 
00885 
00886 void ControlServer::AddListener(VariableAttribut* var, unsigned listener_id)
00887 {
00888         listValueListener.Lock();
00889         ValueListener* vl = FindValueListener(var);
00890         if(vl) vl->AddListener(listener_id);
00891         else
00892         {
00893                 listValueListener.Add(new ValueListener(var, listener_id));
00894         }
00895         listValueListener.Unlock();
00896 }
00897 
00898 void ControlServer::RemoveListener(VariableAttribut* var, unsigned int pid)
00899 {
00900         listValueListener.Lock();
00901         if(var)
00902         {
00903                 ValueListener* vl = FindValueListener(var);
00904                 if(vl) vl->RemoveListener(pid);
00905         }
00906         else
00907         {
00908                 for(listValueListener.First(); listValueListener.NotAtEnd();
00909                         listValueListener.Next())
00910                         (listValueListener.GetCurrent())->RemoveListener(pid);
00911         }
00912         listValueListener.Unlock();
00913 }
00914 
00915 ValueListener* ControlServer::FindValueListener(VariableAttribut* var)
00916 {
00917         ValueListener* vl = NULL;       
00918 
00919         for(listValueListener.First(); 
00920                 vl == NULL && listValueListener.NotAtEnd(); listValueListener.Next())
00921         {
00922                 if((listValueListener.GetCurrent())->var == var) 
00923                         vl = listValueListener.GetCurrent();
00924         }       
00925         return vl;
00926 }
00927 
00929 ValueListener::ValueListener(VariableAttribut* v, unsigned int pid)
00930 {
00931         var = v;
00932         AddListener(pid);
00933 }
00934 
00935 ValueListener::~ValueListener()
00936 { 
00937         var = NULL;
00938         listListener.Empty();
00939 }
00940 
00941 void ValueListener::AddListener(unsigned int listener_id)
00942 { 
00943         OmiscidTrace( "addListener  %s %u\n", var->GetName().GetStr(), listener_id);
00944         listListener.Add(listener_id);
00945 }
00946 
00947 void ValueListener::RemoveListener(unsigned int listener_id)
00948 { 
00949         listListener.Remove(listener_id); 
00950 }
00951 
00952 bool ValueListener::HasListener() const
00953 {
00954         return listListener.GetNumberOfElements() != 0; 
00955 }

00967 bool ControlServer::SetServiceName(const SimpleString service_name)

00970         {
00971                 return false;
00972         }
00973 
00974         serviceName = service_name;
00975         return true;
00976 }
